level.text: To be licensed under this chapter, an animal facility shall do the following:
Meet the standards set forth in this chapter; and
Be under the direction of a veterinarian in good standing with the Board who is:
The owner, partner, president, or chief operating officer of the facility; and
Personally responsible for maintaining, such facility within the standards set forth in this chapter.
An applicant for or holder of a license to operate a mobile clinic is required to have a permanent mailing address.
